info.description: Part of the labscript suite, the labscript Python library provides a translation from simple Python code to complex hardware instructions. The library is used to construct a "connection table" containing information about what hardware is being used and how it is interconnected. Devices described in this connection table can then have their outputs set by using a range of functions, including arbitrary ramps.
info.name: labscript
info.summary: Part of the labscript suite, this library translates simple Python code to instructions for hardware timed laboratory experiments.
info.html_description: Part of the labscript suite, the labscript Python library provides a translation from simple Python code to complex hardware instructions. The library is used to construct a “connection table” containing information about what hardware is being used and how it is interconnected. Devices described in this connection table can then have their outputs set by using a range of functions, including arbitrary ramps.
